about_the_game:
The Frosted

A hand-drawn roguelite shooter blending old-school mechanics with modern twists, featuring Ursula on her journey through a magical world. This paper-like fairytale, starring a brave young girl, reveals her complex character traits through engaging gameplay, creating an intentionally ambivalent experience.

Features

Engage in fast-paced roguelite shooter action with procedurally generated levels, ensuring each run is unique. Discover powerful artifacts that enhance your abilities, meet magical NPCs, and uncover secret rooms, all wrapped in beautifully hand-drawn, animated graphics with original sound design.

The Game World

Explore five distinct biomes filled with dangerous monsters and unpredictable bosses. From icy wastelands to towering mountain ranges, treacherous dungeons, and the mysterious forbidden forest, every step of your journey is fraught with peril.

The Plot

Ursula's story delves into the moral ambiguity of sacrifice for the Greater Good. Your choices throughout the game will impact the outcome: will Ursula lose her grip on reality or make the right decision? But what truly is the "right" choice?

Art Style

The hand-drawn, paper-like graphics and frame-by-frame animations

short_description: The Frosted is a roguelite shooter packed with intense action and magical combat. Guide Ursula through vibrant worlds, unleash devastating attacks, and battle mighty bosses. Unravel mysteries, discover secrets, and grow stronger with every run to uncover the true cost of her greatest wish.
